means: （以宗教为主题的）清唱剧，神剧
[地名] [阿根廷、危地马拉] 奥拉托里奥

sentence.Network_en: It's the world's most popular oratorio.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是世界上最流行的清唱剧。

sentence.Network_en: This Christmas morning, radios around the world will play the Christmas Oratorio.
sentence.Network_cn: 今年圣诞节早上, 世界各地的广播电台都会播放《圣诞节清唱剧》.

sentence.Network_en: The Glee Club decided to present an oratorio during their recital.
sentence.Network_cn: 高兴俱乐部的决定提出的清唱剧在其演奏.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 清唱剧（oratorio）(Oratorio)是一种从十七世纪以来发展起来的音乐形式，常以宗教的或半宗教的故事作为主题，没有复杂的舞台情节而注重音乐 …
神剧（oratorio）（Oratorio）是一种大型的音乐作品，通常同时使用管弦乐团、独唱家以及合唱团。网络上，被网友引申无新意。
神曲（Oratorio）也是一种大型套曲，也都以圣经中的故事为内容，歌词都来自圣经，亨德尔的《弥赛亚》，是用圣经经文重写歌词， …
音乐形容词 - benhe30的日志 - 网易博客 ... plainsong 圣歌 oratorio 宗教剧 motet 宗教赞美歌.

list.abs: 搜索‘圣诞清唱剧 Christmas Oratorio CD1 约翰塞巴斯蒂安巴赫’歌曲、歌手、专辑、歌词资源,尽在百度音乐。百度音乐为你提供最人性化的歌曲搜索,网罗全网最全的.
神剧受难曲 ( oratorio passion )：这类作品的首创者为1643年 Thomas Selle of Hamburg。巴赫的《约翰受难曲 》和《马太受难曲  …
The orchestra and chorus performed an Easter oratorio ., 乐团和合唱队表演了复活节圣乐.
the world ' s most popular oratorio ., 世界上最流行的清唱剧.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Italian, from ecclesiastical Latin oratorium 'oratory', from the musical services held in the church of the Oratory of St Philip Neri in Rome

entry.def: An oratorio is a long piece of music with a religious theme which is written for singers and an orchestra.

means.word_mean: 1. a musical composition for voices and orchestra based on a religious text

auth_sentence.content: No Venetian oratorio from the 17th century survives.
auth_sentence.res_content: No Venetian oratorio from the 17th century survives.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No Venetian oratorio from the 17th century survives.

auth_sentence.content: He turned the job down, but agreed instead to compose an oratorio for the festival.
auth_sentence.res_content: He turned the job down, but agreed instead to compose an oratorio for the festival.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He turned the job down, but agreed instead to compose an oratorio for the festival.

auth_sentence.content: His next major work, the oratorio The Dream of Gerontius, quickly became successful in Britain and Germany.
auth_sentence.res_content: His next major work, the oratorio The Dream of Gerontius, quickly became successful in Britain and Germany.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His next major work, the oratorio The Dream of Gerontius, quickly became successful in Britain and Germany.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"音乐术语"; 2. 表名词,"人,物或状态"

stems_affixes.word_buile: sol单独+o音乐术语→n.独奏 adj.&adv.单独的[地];独唱的[地]
sol单独+o音乐术语→n.独奏 adj.&adv.单独的[地];独唱的[地]
bass低音+o音乐术语→n.低音部,低音歌手
concert音乐会+o音乐术语→n.协奏曲
cre增长+escend开始+o音乐术语→n.[音乐]声音渐强
di使+minu=min小+end+o音乐术语→n.[音乐]渐弱
orat说+ori+o音乐术语→n.清唱剧
pian轻柔+o音乐术语→n.钢琴
sopran高音,高声+o音乐术语→n.女高音,最高者
tang+o音乐术语→来自黑人的舞
brave勇敢的+o人,物或状态→bravo亡命徒
dynam力量+o表名词→n.发电机
fiasc+o人,物或状态→意大利词,愿意为易碎的瓶子
fresc=fresh新鲜的+o人,物或状态→指画在墙上的画鲜艳
gust趣味+o人,物或状态→n.爱好,兴致勃勃

stems_affixes.value_cn: [剧院或乐团等]经理人,主办者
stems_affixes.word_buile: impresari=impresar+o人,物或状态→n.[剧院或乐团等]经理人,主办者
maestr=master大师+o人,物或状态→n.音乐大师
magnific庄严的,崇高的+o人,物或状态→n.贵族,高官,显要人物
manifest显然的,明白的+o人,物或状态→n.宣言,声明
mot动+o人,物或状态→motto→行动指南→座右铭,箴言
pati=pat+o人,物或状态→n.庭院,平台
relieve浮现+o人,物或状态→relievo浮雕
tyr+o人,物或状态→来自拉丁文tiro,新手
volcan来自罗马神话中的火神Vulcan+o人,物或状态→n.火山
